steps.title: Welcome to the Ranch
steps.body: You run a dragon ranch. Breed dragons and fill orders to grow. Press Next to start.

steps.title: Click a Dragon
steps.body: Click any dragon in the yard to open its details and see its traits.

steps.title: Open Breeding
steps.body: Click the ?? Breed button to open the Breeding panel.

steps.title: Pick Parents
steps.body: Select two adult dragons for Parent A and Parent B slots.

steps.title: Create an Egg
steps.body: Press Breed to make an egg. The egg inherits traits from both parents.

steps.title: Advance a Season
steps.body: Press Advance Season to let time pass and progress eggs and dragons.

steps.title: Watch It Grow
steps.body: Advance seasons until the egg hatches and the hatchling matures to adult.

steps.title: Check Orders
steps.body: Open Orders to see customers and their required traits.

steps.title: Fulfill an Order
steps.body: Choose an order, pick a matching dragon, and fulfill it to earn money.

steps.title: Build Facilities
steps.body: Open Build to add capacity and bonuses. Buy what you can afford.

steps.title: Tutorial Complete
steps.body: Keep breeding, selling, and building. Use traits to hit tougher orders. Press Next to finish.

steps.title: Trait Unlocked: Color
steps.body: Reputation 1 unlocks Color. Dragons can be Red (RR), Pink (RW), or White (WW).

steps.title: Breeding Color
steps.body: Color is incomplete dominance: RR+WW -> all RW; RW+RW -> 25% RR, 50% RW, 25% WW. Use Breed panel to preview.

steps.title: Color Orders Arrive
steps.body: Customers now ask for specific colors. Try breeding a Pink (RW) dragon and check Orders.
